text:
Scarlett Moffatt wows in red after slamming "d**khead" Zayn Malik for the way he treated Perrie Edwards The Gogglebox star isn't pulling any punches as she lays into the ex-One Direction singer Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Scarlett Moffatt hit The Royal Television Society Programme Awards Share this video Get celebs     
Scarlett Moffatt is firmly team Perrie Edwards. 
The Gogglebox star, who dazzled in a red trouser suit at the Royal Television Society Awards in London on Tuesday night, wasn't happy about how the former One Direction star handled his split from ex-fiancee Perrie back in August 2015. 
Writing in her new autobiography Scarlett Says, she branded the singer - who reportedly broke things off with a single text - a "d**khead". 
She wrote: "He acted like such a tw*t. I hope people realise what a d***head he is, and that his music bombs. Scarlett at the Royal Television Society Awards at the Grosvenor Hotel in London (Photo: FameFlynet) The Gogglebox star was looking red hot in this look (Photo: FameFlynet) 
"Seriously, who does he think he is?" she continued in a passage featured in this week's Reveal magazine. 
Perrie previously described their split as the "worst time of her life". 
"A four-year relationship, two-year engagement ended by a simple text message. Just like that," she said. 
"After I split with my partner, out of the blue, I had nowhere to go, which was incredibly stressful. For a while I had no idea what to do." Read More Perrie's now in a happy relationship (Photo: Instagram) Scarlett: "Seriously, who does he think he is?" (Photo: FameFlynet) 
However, Zayn later denied that's how he ended things, telling Fader magazine: "I have more respect for Perrie than to end anything over text message. 
"I love her a lot, and I always will, and I would never end our relationship over four years like that. She knows that, I know that, and the public should know that as well." Read More Singer/songwriter Zayn Malik visits "The Elvis Duran Z100 Morning Show" (Photo: Getty) (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
On Tuesday night Scarlett was joined by a host of other famous faces at the annual awards event where Ant & Dec added yet another shiny prize to add to their bulging trophy cabinet after Saturday Night Takeaway was named best entertainment show. Like us on Facebook
